rackSelectivo.name: Rack Selectivo
rackSelectivo.description: Direct access, high turnover, and versatile shelving system. Optimal organization for an efficient warehouse.

anguloRanurado.name: Ángulo Ranurado
anguloRanurado.description: Lightweight storage, metal trays, easy assembly, supports up to 250kg and great versatility.

rackPushback.name: Rack Pushback
rackPushback.description: LIFO depth storage, optimizes space. Direct pallet access, custom-made, variable load and height.

rackDriveIn.name: Rack Drive In
rackDriveIn.description: High-density storage, large pallet volume. Ideal for low turnover. Optimizes warehouse space and stability.

rackDinamico.name: Rack Dinámico
rackDinamico.description: FIFO gravity storage, rear access and front exit. Optimizes rotation, no forklift entry.

rackAutoportante.name: Rack Autoportante
rackAutoportante.description: Warehouse structure, maximum space. Building integration, high efficiency. Advanced and secure storage.

miniRack.name: Mini Rack
miniRack.description: Manual and pallet storage. Efficient picking, medium load. Direct access, balanced capacity.
